content: I'm looking for some shoe cleaning tips. I've been meaning to organize my shoe rack and get rid of some old shoes, but I want to make sure I clean the ones I'm keeping properly. By the way, speaking of old shoes, I had to throw away my favorite sneakers recently because of a hole in the sole - I tried to fix them with some glue, but it didn't work, so I reluctantly threw them away and ordered a new pair online on the same day.
